artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Takenouchi Magohachi
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: beginning of a procession viewed from above so mostly only the participants' heads are visible; three men crouch along a wall at L, bowing at the oncoming procession; three puppies near the men at L play and wrestle; trees and fence above bowing men; bay in background
inscription:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

inscribed URQ
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Fifty-three Stations along the Tōkaidō (Tōkaidō gojūsan tsugi no uchi 東海道五十三次之内), also known as the First Tōkaidō or Hōeidō Tōkaidō
title: Fujikawa--Scene at Outskirts Post
